Reviews.Title: “Rude, dirty and unpleasant”
Reviews.Author: katec57589
Reviews.Content: friend total 4 kids stayed 2 nights found manager staff extremely rude unpleasant lady yelled friend ours stopped chat told home couldnt sit pool unless paid smelled dark main lobby mildew smelling cover nose walked nice pool hot stay motel manager ruin days vacation accommodations terrible

Reviews.Title: “I don't like to be treated like a child.”
Reviews.Author: Guest112
Reviews.Content: kings arms immediately realized kids running sat bed feet black carpets extremely disgusting bathrooms cleaned daily updated ina time stay please bring own towels wash cloths ones paper thin dont smell probably recommend couple children single person couldnt kids understand concept wear shoes hang beach towels hang restroom didnt dry dont extra person desk door laptop expecting able access internet directions wireless internet tell language am computer savvy figure thankfully brought aircard trip cell phone phones life stayed motel phone personally didnt feel comfortable phone pool morning late closes morning owners constantly watching ur move understand probably kinds people shouldnt run customers due past bad experiences pay beds uncomfortable ur chiropractor return location wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Not the worst I've ever stayed, but far from the best”
Reviews.Author: cherryiice
Reviews.Content: guess depends standards pretty disappointed stay motel ex pretty cheap pretty low standards bothered clean liked incredibly unattractive tv broken moved discovery bothered service people charge completely brought attention completely unmotivated inconveniences experienced extra blanket middle night sol front desk completely unmanned 11pm 6am answers posted door situation pretty desperate convince stay

HotelInfo.Name: Kings Arms Motel
